column1: 4.1.4.3.2.1	Summary of evidence and recommendation for sacral nerve stimulation
Offer bladder wall injections of onabotulinumtoxinA (100 U) to patients with OAB/UUI   refractory to conservative therapy or drug treatment.
Warn patients of the limited duration of response, risk of UTI and possible prolonged   need for clean intermittent self-catheterisation prior to offering treatment with   onabotulinumtoxinA.
